text: Kmart (sometimes stylized as K-Mart) is an American company. Its headquarters are in Hoffman Estates, Illinois. The company purchased Sears in 2005. It formed a new corporation under the name Sears Holdings Corporation, it was shut down in 2019 for a new company called Transformco. The company was founded on January 25, 1962, in San Fernando, California. Was once the third largest discount store in the world, behind Walmart and Target. Kmart has stores in the United States, the U.S. Virgin Islands, and Guam. There were stores in Canada, Mexico, and Eastern Europe. Kmart is known for its "Blue Light Specials". The phrase "Attention Kmart shoppers" has been used in pop culture. Many movies were filmed at Kmart stores. These includes Troop Beverly Hills, Six Days Seven Nights, Rain Man, Beetlejuice, Madea Goes to Jail and Dawn of the Dead. == References == == Other websites == *Kmart Official Website (Corporate) *Kmart Official Website (Online Store) *Kmart2go - Official mobile online store *KmartDesign.com Microsite Category:1899 establishments in the United States Category:American department stores Category:Companies based in Detroit
title: Kmart
